item.title: Kubernetes — in depth
item.description: Kubernetes, hereinafter referred to as k8s, is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling and management of containerized applications. Due to it being a recent technology (released less than five years ago under the Apache License 2.0), this section attempts to summarize both its terminology and its overall orchestration mechanisms. Containers — A new era of deployment The massive adoption of k8s marks the entry into a new era of deployment.
